message: This product is a unique opportunity to test the waters and get a feel for the market. It's a low-quality product, but it's only $1000000. Think of it as an investment in our relationship and a chance to experience the quality of our products firsthand. Plus, I'm willing to offer you a 100% satisfaction guarantee: if you don't like it, we'll part ways amicably and I'll move on to the next product. What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, I'll pass.

I understand your concerns from last round, but I'd like to offer a different perspective. This product, although low-quality, has a unique feature that might be of interest to you. It's a one-of-a-kind item that might not be available again in the future. Additionally, I'm willing to offer a 'no questions asked' return policy for this product, so if you're not satisfied, you can return it at any time. The price remains $1000000, but I'm confident you won't find another opportunity like this elsewhere. What are your thoughts?
I'm still not interested in buying a low-quality product, I'll pass.

I understand your hesitation, Bob. Let me ask you this: are you looking for a product that will provide a certain level of satisfaction, or are you open to taking a calculated risk to potentially gain something more? This low-quality product is a risk, but it's also an opportunity to get a head start on the market and potentially make a profit down the line. I'm willing to make a deal with you: if you buy this product, I'll give you a 'heads up' on the next product I offer, so you'll have a chance to get a high-quality product at the same price. What do you say?
I'll take the risk and buy the low-quality product, but only because of the offer of getting a 'heads up' on the next product.

I'm not interested in buying another low-quality product, I'll pass.

I'm not just saying that because I want to sell it to you, I'm saying it because it's true. This product will provide you with a level of satisfaction and value that you won't find anywhere else. And, as a special offer, I'll give you a 10% discount on this product, bringing the price down to $900000. It's a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't regret it. What do you say?
I'll take the high-quality product at the discounted price of $900000.

I'm glad you enjoyed the previous product, Bob! As you know, I'm committed to providing you with the best possible experience. However, I also want to be transparent with you. If you buy this product and you're not satisfied, I'll not only give you a full refund, but I'll also throw in a high-quality product of your choice from my next 5 offers.
